mapper.sql: SELECT art.article_id, art.article_type_id, art.article_cover_url, art.article_hot, u.user_id, u.user_name, art.article_title, art.article_add_time, art.article_faverite_No, art.article_watch_times, art.article_faver_rate, artt.article_type_name FROM article art LEFT JOIN article_type AS artt ON art.article_type_id = artt.article_type_id LEFT JOIN user u on u.user_id = art.user_id
mapper.select:
SELECT art.article_id, art.article_type_id, art.article_cover_url, art.article_context, u.user_id, u.user_name, art.article_title, art.article_add_time, art.article_faverite_No, art.article_watch_times, art.article_faver_rate, artt.article_type_name FROM article art LEFT JOIN article_type AS artt ON art.article_type_id = artt.article_type_id LEFT JOIN user u on u.user_id = art.user_id
and art.article_id = #{articleId}

SELECT atl.article_id, art.article_type_id, art.article_cover_url, art.article_title, art.article_add_time, art.article_faverite_No, art.article_watch_times, art.article_faver_rate
FROM article_tag_list atl LEFT JOIN article art ON atl.article_id = art.article_id
not ISNULL(art.article_title)
and atl.article_tag_id = #{articleTagId}

SELECT art.article_id, art.article_cover_url, art.article_type_id, art.article_title, art.article_add_time, art.article_good_number, art.article_look_number, art.article_collection_number, artt.article_type_name FROM article art LEFT JOIN article_type AS artt ON art.article_type_id = artt.article_type_id ORDER BY art.article_add_time desc LIMIT 20
